page_content: The page provides information about a German language proficiency tool for primary schools in the Canton of Zürich.

The page provides information about special educational needs in the regular school system, including procedures for assigning students to special education measures, types of support available, and guidelines for integration within the Canton of Zürich.

The page details the legal regulations and guidelines for medical products in the Canton of Zürich, including market surveillance, maintenance, preparation, and instructions for the use of medical products such as sterilizers and measuring devices.

The page provides tools and guidelines for planning the school year in the Canton of Zürich, including calculation tools, planning tools, and instructions for school leaders. It includes downloadable files such as Excel tools for planning and PDF manuals for guidance.

The page outlines the procedures for cost distribution in the handling of contaminated sites in the Canton of Zürich, including responsibilities for implementing measures, cost-bearing obligations, and guidelines for cost distribution procedures, along with downloadable PDF documents related to the subject.

The page provides information on various training programs and courses for municipal authorities in the Canton of Zürich, covering topics such as legal foundations, finance, education, construction, infrastructure, social security, health, and child and adult protection.

The page details the continuation of the "Self-Learning Semester" (SLS) project at the Kantonsschule Zürcher Oberland, including the evaluation, implementation, and extension of the project. It discusses the subjects involved, the teaching methods, the role of teachers, and the overall impact on students' learning.

The page provides information about the requirements and procedures for self-inspection of vehicles in the Canton of Zürich, including conditions, guidelines, equipment, and technical knowledge needed for self-inspection, as well as details about the application process, e-learning courses, and related legal regulations.
